from or relating to Flanders (= an area in northern Belgium): Flemish paintings
More examplesFewer examplesWilly is Flemish and proud of it. This oil portrait from the 1630s by Flemish master Anthony van Dyck is of Philip, 4th Earl of Pembroke, and his family.More than 1,000 years old, the city is part Flemish and part French. the cobblestone streets of Leuven, a Flemish university townBoth Flemish and Walloon newspapers have devoted pages of copy to the mechanics of a split.
